def isprime(a):
    if (a!=2 and a%2==0) or a==1:
        return False
    else:
        for i in range(3,a/2):
            if a%i==0:
                return False
        return True
        
def ispalindrome(a):
    return a==a[::-1]
    
N=int(raw_input())
while True:
    if ispalindrome(str(N)):
        if isprime(N):
            print(N)
            break
    N+=1
